content.detailedDescription: This all started about a week and a half ago .. i was out walking my dog and i always look up at the night sky and i notice a light moving and it was not like any i had seen before and so i watched it and it moved back and forth but over long distances. after about 15min i saw another light and it flew straight and then slowed brightened and when it brightened i felt a sharp pain in my head like something just stabbed my brain and then it disappeared. i went back home and felt very uneasy. three days later i cld not shake the uneasy feeling especially at night i just keep feeling like something is there. but last night on the 26th of june i was letting my dog out again and looked up and the sky was beautiful and then i felt scared and went right inside i went to bed. what i am about to tell you i have no idea if it was a dream or really i can always tell the difference but with this i just don't know i feel crazy even writing this but here i go. i woke up and i cld not feel my bed below me my room was dimly lite and there was a being to my left i tried to scream but i could not i could not ever open my mouth or move my heart was pound and it kept going from my head to my feet with something that had a green beam of light it didn't hurt but felt warm. everything about what i was wearing was the same as when i went to bed. and then the next thing i know i am laying back on my bed with covers off and they r never off and my heart is pound and everything is like what i was seeing . i don't know what happened or if it was even real but i do know that i have felt weird and like i am being watched. please help me feel sane again
content.summary: I saw one fly back and forth 3 times and then about 15min later i saw another light stop turn 90 degrees and brighten and disappear

content.detailedDescription: Observed what appeared to be a satellite in orbit. watched it travel about 75 degrees than stopped and shot back the opposite direction and stopped. thank i saw probably another 6 star like objects separate off and fly randomly away in different directions. some zig zaging some in straight paths. the main object also moving. some came back within a few seconds and the others a few minutes. and than main object vanished
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fast moving almost like a satellite than abruptly changes flight path

content.detailedDescription: My younger cousin (3) visiting had a gum infection and was being driven to the hospital by my first cousin, and her mother, my aunt. within 3 minutes of leaving the house, the came running in the house screaming "there is a ufo." my mother and i jumped in the car, and the sighting was less than a half mile away. they had said another car also spotted the object coming over the tree tops (approx 20-30 ft, above pine trees) and abruptly made a u-turn. i saw the object at 30-50 ft in the air. it was roughly ovoid shaped, with approx. 13 yellowish lights defining the outline of the object. it hovered with a static in the air, thats the best i can describe it, but electricity in the air is what it felt like. was quite large, no less than 30' in diameter, possibly as great as 100'. it ascended at a steady pace, directly upwards, until it was no longer visible. we actually called the national weather service which has a station nearby, the police, and the news, but no other reports were related to us. i went to school the next day and drew what i saw on a piece of paper, a classmate made fun of me, and i was suspended for the first time in my life, so the memory is vivid. no one in the family that was there has forgotten either. we live on the space coast of florida, so we are familiar with both shuttle/rocket launches and jet and helicopters that are common closer to patrick air force base and kennedy space center.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Will never forget, whole family saw, was suspended from school next day

content.detailedDescription: I was up late, working in my garage when i heard a military helicopter flying by. i ran outside to see it because we're in a flight path where planes dont fly over after 11:30pm and it's strange when anything flies by in the middle of the night. when i got outside, i was looking for the helicopter when a bright round light flies from above my house towards the east- almost as fast as a shooting star, which is what i thought it was, however, the helicopter i first heard was following it but keeping it's distance. the object had flown far enough to where a neighborhood tree blocked me from seeing it. just when i was about to settle on it being a shooting star - it darted north, then curved towards the south west. right then, the helicopter that was following it, stopped following and a small amber light shot across the horizon from north to south almost like it was meeting up or going after that light. it was amazing. we saw something similar on feb. 27, 2014 at a lower altitude above our house.
content.summary: Heard military helicopter flying late, ran outside and saw a bright light flying towards the east, light dimmed out, then lit back up - helicopter following the object.

content.detailedDescription: Like a shooting star enter atmosphere turn red back to white then disappear . traveling from east to west descending slightly
content.summary: Like a meteor

content.detailedDescription: 10am departure from residence in aberdeen to visit son and family in tenino wa with stops in olympia black lake area proceeding to tenino via interstate 5 after. observed military helicopters (pair) in same area on outbound trip to olympia (approx. 10:30am). my return trip to aberdeen is when sighting occurred. visibility were restricted due to inclement weather, heavy to moderate rainfall. at time of observation of lights i had just passed the last exit's (overpass of hiway 12 and 8). moments after passing the area of elma wa something caught my attention in my drivers door mirror that caused me to turn my head and look. trailing behind, left of my vehicle as it/we were heading west was a bright blueish green light .. at that time it were paralleling the highway. there is a local airport for small planes at elma near where the sighting first occurred. initially i thought it were a plane but the lights were constant and no flashing aviation lights were observed what so ever at any time. within a couple minutes it was directly adjacent to my drivers door window a few hundred yards south of my location at an elevation of from between 100 and 300 ft. unknown what the cloud ceiling was at the time but it remained under that. as my self and the other vehicles on the road were approaching the city of montesano wa the object veered north and crossed in front of my vehicle, between my own and the vehicle ahead which was at least 400 to 500 yards in front of me and was clearly visible for a matter of scant seconds. it was at this time i had the sense that there were more to it than merely a blue green light. there were discernable features but indistinct still due to weather? want to say, glass like, or silver, reflective. unknown as to whether my feeling i were looking at a light in the center of an inverted glass bowl were correct but that was my impression. the object passed directly in front of my vehicle at no less than 200ft and then was out of sight due to trees. in light of my statement earlier that weather is/was a factor it was indeed but, new vehicle, new glass/new windshield wipers, made for as clear a view as is possible from a motor vehicle.
content.summary: Driving p vehicle, hard rain, object trailed then passed and turn n-nw

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of 6-19-16 at 2318 hours a ufo of the above description was observed through the front windshield of a parked prius. i had just placed my lunch pail onto the back seat and had started the vehicle. i was about the take my foot off the brake pedal and was looking straight ahead. a large green ufo immediately came into view and crossed the exit lane travelling west about 20 paces north of deer valley road. i later stepped off the distances from my location to the sighting and it was 100 paces from where the vehicle was parked. the craft was just above (3) short palm trees but became obscured behind a row of eucalyptus trees. upon sighting the ufo i sped down onto deer valley road and jumped out of the prius to further observe the craft. i observed the following as it headed down deer valley road at the same elevation as originally observed. the rear of the ufo had (2) lights on the left and right, a white light above a red light the outside corners had a radius. the green light was like a green mirrored sphere however the light was moving like liquid mercury, most beautiful thing i've ever seen. the craft had a ring around the middle, not a narrow ring but a thick ring that was serrated like a quarter. the serrated outside edge had flat spaces between the serrations. the ring was a semi transparent and diffused white glow but not bright white light. the size of the craft could be judged because the road was like a measuring tape. the craft was slightly wider than the (2) way road. this craft proceeded down deer valley road and disappeared from sight due to the low elevation and turning northwest around 135th ave.

the video shows the eerie lights on (2) different stucco light columns as the ufo was moving. this is security camera on ir, a camera in the best location stopped working at 2316:22 hours for reasons unknown.

i also observed a similar ufo on 6-25-16 at 2115 hours that was reported and can be found online under green glendale ufo. i did not report this sighting but observed this ufo with another person.
content.summary: Bright green ufo over deer valley road

content.detailedDescription: Spouse and i were returning from the store when we both saw two very bright orbs pass up ahead immediately after the car in front of us. the first in line was about the size of a junior soccer ball and yellowish white. the second, about 3 ft behind and in tight formation, was closer to baseball or softball sized and pure red. the line was absolutely straight. we never saw it waver. i don't know the speed except that it took about 3 seconds for them to cross our side of the highway and enter what we would soon learn is a large marsh.
content.summary: Two bright orbs of different size and color crossed highway ahead as if in chase.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend taking a late night ride on atvs.I worked 2 water companies,my friend maintained the golf course that the water company supplied.Celebrating memorial weekend taking a 23 mile ride to a gold mine on private property my boss owned.Left his house around 1:30 am.The road we took was near his house and would take us a all the way to our destination where we would turn and go up to where the gold mines were.Was cold so we stopped often to warm our hands by the exhaust from the atvs.
about every 3 miles we would stop.About half way there we stopped to get warm and smoke a cigarette.We noticed bright lights at the foothills of the mountain to our right.Being that it was early morning of memorial day weekend we thought it could be a camp fire but the light were strobing like police cars.I was relatively new to arizona and had only been there a few years,i loved to take pics of scenery and mountains.We didn't have binoculars but i had my digital camera.I turned to get my camera to zoom in on the lights to see what was going on.My friend yelled "look"!
i turned and saw them shoot up into the sky,but one came close to us,then shot up to join the others.I was white with strobing blue light.The others were white with red and purple strobing light.I lifted up my camera and got 2 pictures before they were gone.I looked back to where they were sitting before they took off and i seen streaks of what i thought was a smoke trail,but it was falling back to the ground.It was dust that they pulled off the desert floor.They didn't make any noise,and they wasn't pushed up by anything that came from under them.In fact going up caused a vacuum under them,pulling up dust,and not scattering it.They were spinning,but not like a top that would stay still.They spun like they were out of balance.The thin threadlike trail left behind each one would make a 6 .The threadlike trail attached to each one of the 3 orbs like they were tied together somehow.They started separating,splitting off into more of them.The threadlike trails getting longer and more were in line with each other.As they went up and separated,they resembled a snake that wiggled across the night sky.As they went out of sight,they were only a twinkle of light ,then they were gone.All this happened in a matter of a minute or two,but it is burned into my memory like it happened yesterday but it happened may 31,2010 between 3:00 am and 3:30 am.6 years,1 month,and 27 days from today.The first thing i said was "what the @&#% was that? my friend said"what do you suppose that was? i was confused by his answer and his being calm about it.He seen it too but was not surprised by it.He went on to tell me about his abduction when he was a child.I would not have believe him but he seen it with me.I stood there on the side of the road,staring up into the sky where i saw them last until daylight.About 3 hours i stood there,trying to get my mind to accept what i saw.It was not possible.It went against all i had been taught about physics.Maximum speeds,gravity,sudden turns,etc.
i feel like i would never be normal again.Who would i tell?Where do i find answers?
i took my camera home after we got back.I put the sd card out of mt camera,into my computer with a usb adapter and pulled up the almost totally black pics.I could see specs of light in then.I zoomed in on the lights and cropped them,then saved them to a cd rom.I was blown away again.It was not my imagination.I seen them with my own eyes,with another witness,and pictures i took.What more proof did i need....But what to do with it?.Nobody believed me.It caused so much problems for me for the next couple of years.It was only the first experience,i seen more things after that,that would further confuse me.They came to the ranch where i lived during a bad storm,strobing purple light again and the power surging.They were all around my house,stand far away,but i could see what looked like glowing white eyes.I won't go into detail on this yet.For another time.After this i stood in my yard at the ranch and watched something spinning,like a middle out of control.It spun in one direction,then spun the other direction,then opened up a huge circle,then something,a spot in the middle of it came out,then the circle was gone.This also will be detailed some other time.This month,june 4th,close to where i lived in az,a meteor lit up the sky shortly before 4:00 am.The area is a no fly zone now.All gps scrambled,only drive through with escort.The pictures of the trails do not resemble a meteor.We are being lied to.I have learned that what we are told is fiction,is not fiction,it is fact.What we are told that is fact...Is actually fiction.Read your bible folks.That where you will find answers to what and who they are.Be prepared.Thats the only hope you have...
content.summary: 3 strobing colored lights ascended pulling dust quietly spinning thin threadlike trail split off into more resembled snake in sky attached following each other gone in seconds straight up flickered gone

content.detailedDescription:
Work colleague observed this while traveling to work via sky train line from surrey.
i do not believe the ufo was visible by naked eye and only appeared on android device camera
content.summary: 2 objects only seen. 1 top left of picture the other towards the distance to the right

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped out the front door onto the landing of my house and was calling my dog. i looked upwards to the sky and immediately noticed an object that was much larger and brighter than the other stars and moving slightly up and down and side to side...So slightly that i stood and watched it for a few minutes to make sure my eyes weren't playing tricks on me. the sky was clear that night and full of stars. we have no neighbors around us and are surrounded by woods so it's very dark - nothing lighting up the sky but the stars. i couldn't figure out what it could possibly be, but i had never seen anything that big, bright, and noticeable in the sky in my life.  i went and got my cell phone to take some pictures of the object, and when i finally focused on it i couldn't believe what i was seeing. there were no other stars visible when looking through the camera i could only see the object - (but to the naked eye there were lots of stars visible) - not only that, although the object was only moving slightly to my naked eye, when i looked at it through the camera, it was blinking and moving all over the place. i started recording it, and i "zoomed" in and out on the object so that i could try and see what it was. when i magnified the object i was in awe...There were different colors coming off of it, and it was moving so much - i kept asking myself how that could be possible when what i was directly looking at was moving, but not like that! i stopped recording when my phone ran out space!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appears as large oddly shaped bright star that blinks and moves slightly (naked eye)

content.detailedDescription: Driving down broadway toward omaha, i ovservered a silver object reflecting light light from the surface and sitting still in the sky about 90 degrees over the horizon. immediately upon sighting the object, a stealth bomber flew over us changing direction toward the object low enough to scrape buildings if it went over omaha. it was magnificent. the object then disappeared and the bomber followed in the direction.
content.summary: Silver, reflective, hovering, disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Today i was working in my back yard when i heard a f16 hovering and i told my wife look the airplane but when we look i saw a white dot in the sky very far away.  i told my wife let me get my camera because that look strange.  i took a couple of picts when i look at them in my camera and zoom it in totally stun. the object have two levels and is spherical shape with some light around.  i don't know what it is but i live close to norad. i believe they have totally control on our air space.  so this could be an experiment or an ufo.
content.summary: Ufo in fountain, colorado

content.detailedDescription:
around august 23rd thru the 24th of 2005; hurricane katrina's eye came over my parents home. the hurricane came from the south from new orleans and the gulf of mexico.... the hurricane proceeded north going over foxworth and columbia mississippi from which i were living at the time with my parents...  then the hurricane went north east/east going over hattiesburg mississippi.  complete devastation of trees; buildings; animal life -- (such as cows and deer which were thrown against and wrapped around bob-wired fences) and were later discovered dead.  in addition homes and boats completely obliterated from every  angle  the eye could see. 

at the time i was working on the garbage truck as a hopper for the city of columbia.  on monday, august 29th 2005 -- (after a 12 hour day hauling rotten garbage) due to the electricity going out and everyone that didn't have a generator had to throw away everything they had in their deep freezers and refrigerators.. this event was causing serious smells at every home we arrived to extremely stinking garbage to be hauled away. almost a week later there was still no running water.  

so in extreme need of a bath or shower and refusing to settle washing myself down with wet rags and a bowl of water...  i decided to take a ride to a creek near by a church i use to attend.  after arriving at the creek in pitch dark..... so dark i couldn't see my hand if placed on my nose...  i stripped down and went skinny dipping feeling so refreshed washing the rotten garbage smell off my body. 

as i was washing my cloths and scrubbing myself down with icey cold creek water and soap...  a hugh round like airship with amber glowing orbs came heading straight towards me from the south.... south-west.  as i was watching this object coming towards me.......  completely naked while washing myself and my work cloths.....  i realized this three amber yellowish lights coming towards me at a rate of speed no greater then about 30 mph and at an altitude of about 100 to 150ft; just barely clearing the tops of pine trees.....  i could no longer move a muscle in my arms, legs, neck, fingers or shoulders.......   as if i were completely paralyzed or possessed as the aircraft arrived straight over my head. 
    
as the aircraft arrived straight over my body; i was completely paralyzed to any motions what so ever but i did fill the water moving.  i am blessed that i was standing up in a shallow part of the creek that wasn't deeper than my waist or else i believed i would have drowned if i were swimming.   

the amber cloudy like orbs with a trace of something like a reddish yellow tent swirling inside the amber orbs had all of a sudden turned to a white colored orb with a baby blue tent swirling inside these ivy white orbs. 

when the orbs of this ufo was the color of amber; and before it was coming toward me -- i was extremely scared out of my wits.  all i wanted to do was run away from this ufo as fast as i could.  

however seconds after the orbs of this ufo turned white then swirled the baby blue tent inside of its orb....  
i felt a connection some how with this craft. i instantly went from being scared and wanting to run in the opposite direction of this ufo to feeling at peace. i felt that what ever this object was had no attention in harming me. i still have no idea what it could have been if it was not no ufo because it had absolutely no sound while moving or hovering over my head. there was some heat to the light but it wasn't hot enough to burn me. it seemed as if it read my mind to determine not burn me because as the few moments it was scanning me the lights got really hot and i asked it to not burn me in my mind and the lights started to dim to where it wasn't hot anymore. 


this ufo seem to hover over my head  for about 5-10 minutes then the ivy white-baby blue orb like lights turned yellowish amber again and started to fly  from southeast-east going toward columbia and flying toward hattiesburg mississippi. i saw the amber colored orbs coming toward me at a distance of about 300 yards as it appeared just over the tree-tops and i lost sight of the amber colored orb disk like object about 50-80 yards as it flew toward columbia just over the tree-tops. the ufo never seemed to ascend or descend in altitude the entire time it was in my sight. 

this was the last time i have ever encountered a ufo up close and personal.   i have only encountered lights before this that would shoot across the sky like a shooting star and all of a sudden move in a completely different direction of travel like a v shape in the sky.

after this encounter i raced back home and my parents asked me where have i been because about 5 hours had passed by on something that i felt only took a minutes. i remember leaving right after it turned dark at about 7pm and got home just minutes before midnight.  and a week after this encounter i started receiving hair loss. my hair fell out and never grew back till this day.  

in 2004 i had a mri to determine if i had any back problems for an interview to be a roustabout for diamond offshore; but my father told me to stay in college and to not take the job. the mri's taken in 2004 showed absolutely nothing wrong with me. but after this encounter in 2005 i started to get minor back pains. 

in 2007 after getting a associates degree in electronics at prcc i took a job with at&t to work in new orleans to help rebuild the damage the hurricane caused by flood waters that got so high in some areas that actually got in the cables of the telephone poles and over the peak of houses roofs at a height of 25 foot.  

on september 1st 2009 i had to have a tumor that got removed from inside my spinal cord. the doctor wanted to remove the tumor because it got so large inside my spinal cord that it busted out of my spinal cord and was wrapping around the vertabras outside of my spinal cord. doctor john c steck; a very famous neurologist in marrero louisiana (ranked in the top 10 of all surgeons in this field in the usa) wanted to remove this tumor because he was scared it was going to rupture the main artery that runs down the spinal cord. if this artery got ruptured i would have bleed to death within minutes before i could get any medical attention and if i did get to the hospital no doctor would be able to diagnose the problem before i bleed to death internally.  

in addition ever since this encounter i have been getting nightmares of being adducted and taken right outside of earths orbit to a bee hive honey cone like mothership and not being able to move or wake up until i am returned back to my bedroom.      

i don't know if i have ever was adducted or if they caused this tumor or if i have been implanted with something that hasn't showed up on an mri other that this tumor that was inside my spinal cord or if these nightmares that seems extremely real are an actual reality and not just dreams; but i do know for a fact i have never had any back problems since this encounter in 2005.  

i haven't told many people about what i saw in the summer of 2005 because the people i did mention this too including family looks at me as if i am lying; trying to receive attention; or just simply thinks i am crazy for the dreams i have been receiving or the encounter i witnessed. 

however i am extremely curious if anyone in the state of southern mississippi saw these lights i witnessed in the summer of 2005; just days after the worst hurricane that hit in the history of united stated of america. a hurricane that did the most damage cost wise in united states history. 

i am not looking for attention. but i am curious if anyone has witness anything similar to the most painful and terrifying surgery i was left with after an encounter that will change my life forever. 

thank you 

sincerely:

stephen d. olson
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Life changing; hair loss; possible cause of tumor; communication; vivid dreams

content.detailedDescription:
While i was resting from yard work under the fruit trees, something passed overhead so close to the tree tops, it cast a very tidy shadow on the grass.  it was shaped like a hang glider or a boomerang but proportionately shorter winged.  while the shadow was still visible passing over the yard, we looked up and saw nothing.  it continued overhead and we checked again.  still nothing visible.  we are accustomed to watching birds and airplanes and can always spot them.  this was close, with no sound, no visible object, but it cast a definite dark, crisp shape on the ground.  the shadow was about 5-7 feet across tip to tip.  speed seemed about 10-20 mph.
it went east to west and we lost sight of the shadow.
content.summary: The shadow with clearly defined edges passed low over an area of land without visible object overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed , sleeping and all of a sudden i felt strong vibrations and strane noise , thate woke me up. this is not the first time i saw it so i allready knew what it is. the object was hovering , then it left. beside feeling strange vibrations i knew what it is , because i know e.T's are here , thats a fact. the object left , slowly and thats it. it was dark ,sorry if photo is bad.
content.summary: I was in my bed when this occured,  i heard strange noise , which i hear almost everyday about 3am ... this time it got real.

content.detailedDescription:
Placed a field hunting camera on a tree in my back yard to observe deer . when i looked at the pics i was stunned by the images on it and i still am ! i have 16 time lapse pics of the object that is examining a deer . there is know question about what is happening here . they are sequenced pics that run like a video and they are virtually point blank . i stored the camera immediately and the pics have never been printed , i know that i have something very important here . the object went around the deers head and examined it closely . the deer did not spook or run away but lifted it's head and acknowledged it . when the object turned sideways a cone shaped 
top appears . it is the most riveting pics you will ever see and you will believe in them the second you view them . the objects departure seem to move with the speed of light and appears in the photos in several spots in the sky . the object is solid as you can't see through it. it leaves a spinning mist behind it when it moves .
content.summary: Glowing disk approached a deer , deer aknowledged it , photos of event taken by a stationary field hunting camera / 13 feet away

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were floating on rafts in our pool cloud watching when i noticed what at first i thought were buzzards cruising across the sky. immediately i realized they were a perfect oval shape and very high. i would say somewhat higher than a commercial aircraft and the mass may be similar in size to an average airliner. their speed was much faster than commercial aircraft and i only saw two as i pointed them out to my wife. they moved a crossed the sky at an even pace. toward the end of their track west my wife says she saw a third. they continued west out of site. it only took them about 20 seconds. i have seen satellites, it was a somewhat cloudy day with a very high cloud cover. therefore the craft was easier to see against the grey background. my gut feeling was it may be military. but definitely the shape was a perfect oval with no nose or tail. therefore cruse across the sky and it wasn't quite that fast, but fast none the less. very strange.
content.summary: 3 completely oval shaped craft moved across the sky ,two in formation 3 trailing at speed greater than commercial aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside enjoying the warm weather, when i looked to the north and noticed a sphere glowing red-orange and moving to the south east at a steady speed. it was about the same speed the blue herrons fly. i'm not good at judging size or distance. it was about 50 or 60 degrees from the horizon. i'd guess about 4 feet in diameter. 

it made no noise. i thought at first it might be a large chinese latern, but it was not being pushed by the wind. the direction of the wind was from the due west. the clouds were also moving from the west, perhaps even a bit south of west. it continued steadily to the east-south-east until it seemed to approach near reynolds road (about 1/2 mile from me). then it disappeared, reappeared briefly, then disappeared completely. i never lost sight of it, it just blinked out.

my camera was in the house, so i did not get a picture.

there is a radio antennae (perhaps a cell tower) just past where it seemed to be when it blinked out. i cannot see the strobe at the top of the antennae from where i was sitting, so it must have been higher than the top of the antennae.

it was not a drone, nor a helicopter, nor an airplane, nor a chinese latern. i have no idea what it was.
content.summary: Red-orange glowing sphere moved silently from wnw to ese. very steady speed about the same as blue heron flies. "blinked out" when it got about to reynolds rd. was higher than a radio tower.

content.detailedDescription:
I was inside my apartment watching tv until about 9:30pm.

nearby and visible from my apartment grounds, the city of alcoa was conducting their annual "pre-independence day celebration" called freedomfest, saturday, june 25  9:40-10pm. 

i stepped outside to watch some of the fireworks for a few minutes at the beginning of the show, then went back inside my apartment to continue watching tv. 

just before 10pm, near the end of the fireworks, i went back outside to watch the "grand finale".... after all the fireworks were shot off (10pm), i started walking back to my apartment and that's when i noticed a bright blue light shining through the trees and moving in a southern direction. 

first sighting was 194-198 degrees from my position at an elevation angle of 25 degrees. i stood and watched for a while to see if it would clear the trees and come into open view....It did.

initially i thought it might be a commercial or military aircraft because there is a civilian and military airport nearby, however i found it very unusual to see the color blue light in the sky. i was amazed, curious and slightly confused, this did not seem natural or normal to me and not what i have observed as aircraft.  so i watched hoping to find an explanation or identity of this unusual sight. 


once the object passed by and cleared the trees and came into open sky view, i observed what looked like a ball shaped (circular) object, mostly blue. 

the color was similar to a police blue light but it had a slightly different quality or shade of color that i would describe as "neon-like".   in the center of the blue ball / circle of light was a red color ball / circle.  the ratio of red ball / circle to blue ball / circle was about 1:8....Also noteworthy, unlike regular aircraft, these colored lights did not blink, fade or pulse..... 

an even greater detailed description of the object: imagine a 5 point star, then overlay another 5 point star. now offset the stars to form a 10 point star. that is similar to what formed the blue ball / circle. there was a red circle in the center.  there were no definite lines of separation and no sharp points to the star. it seems like the blue color emanated from the center and became slightly fuzzy near the area of the points, but blending and filling in all together to make the form of a ball or circle of colored light.
   
no sounds were heard.  the object moved slower than a typical helicopter and i would estimate the distance as 2 - 3 miles away maybe further. it moved very smooth and steady, no jerky motions.

shortly after it cleared the trees and came into plain view in the open sky, it seemed to change direction slightly with no change of elevation,
155 - 160 degrees.  

i continued to watch it until it fell below the level of the roof top of my apartment.

***measurements taken in daylight on 27 june, using a magnetic compass, carpenters angle locator and my car's gps location.
content.summary: Ball / circle of colored light travelling through sky, no sound heard

content.detailedDescription: Unable to attach pic and video from cell phone, not tech savy.
content.summary: Had taken my dog out when i saw them, ran in the house got my phone and took a pic and video of them, no noise, had a feeling of dread, they disappeared to ascend as they went ne

content.detailedDescription: I was at a location performing duties for my job which included taking photos of subject properties.  i took approximately 16 photos of various subjects at this location and noticed that there was an object above a building in one of the photos after i had left the location.  it did not appear to be an airplane or any known aircraft.  after noticing this object in the photo, i isolated the object in question in a photo editor and filtered the image to gain some perspective about what was in the photo.  it appears to be an unidentifiable object.  i did not notice this object when i was at this location but do know that there was no noise as one would expect with an airplane, helicopter, etc.
content.summary: Captured image taking job related photos of buildings

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on back porch looking at stars at aprox. 2345hrs. i felt a weird feeling and my body hair went stiff and had a shiver down my spine. a minute later i noticed a dark orb that emitted no light traveling west to east at a steady speed. several minutes later i saw the same object on the same path. it was several hundred feet in the air and was not as plane, bird, or helo.
content.summary: Sphere shaped ufo seen 2x in 10 min

content.detailedDescription: Dark brown _black thing hanging in air for few minutes filmed by a shepherd.You can search online for gettin more usefull info. (search in farsi )
content.summary: The ufo filmed by a shepherd in khorasan state in iran

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work and two stationary bright points of lights in broad daylight caught my eye. i told a co worker to go grab my bag which i keep a camcorder in, while i kept any eye on the two objects. i don't believe they were giving off their own light but rather reflecting the sunlight.

i turned on my camcorder and attempted to zoom in on the objects but it was difficult since they were so small and the camera had a hard time focusing in on them. i was eventually able to zoom in on one of them, focused long enough but still couldn't tell what i was seeing. not until i was able to view the footage in a larger screen. when i got home and was able to view the footage, the object appeared to be a highly reflective, "squared" (meaning sharp edges, not curved), capital "h". it had two long squared pillars with a short bar in the middle...Like a capital "h".

i recorded them for sometime then they slowly went behind the building. i went to put my camcorder away only to see them again but further to the right. so either they came back almost to the point where i originally saw them or there were two more that i didn't see when i saw the original two objects. then those two eventually drifted behind the building as well.
content.summary: Highly reflective. shaped like a "blocky", squared, capital "h"

content.detailedDescription: I did not personally see the abnormality until i recently went through my photos.
content.summary: I was looking through pictures on my phone and noticed and abnormality. lights i did not see previously. red and green. i took photos of an abnormal sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I have always believe in ufos most of my life   it maybe one of the reason my love for astronomy is so great.  i have spent 1000s of hours under the stars observing and have keep my eyes open for object that i or my colleagues could not be explained away    i have to say that there has been a couple of times that what i was observing was questionable but  could always be logically explained .   with that i can say that there is one time i did see an object that was and is today my belief of the real thing and the real reason i believe
the sighting was on july 5th, 1981 between 10:00 to 11:00pm, camping along the conejos river, in conejos county, in the colorado mountains.   my wife went to bed and  i had decided to stay up.    i was sitting in the lawn chair just outside our tent.    i was  looking at the satellites with a pair of 10x50 bushnell binoculars.     i was trying to catch them tumbling as they traveled across the sky.    i was able to catch a hand full of satellites traveling east to west and west to east.    some of them did tumble.   as i was looking for the next satellite i saw a set of 3 lights traveling north to south   the satellites looking lights were in a triangle configuration.   at this time in my life i have never seen a set of satellite traveling in a triangle formation.  so moving my lawn chair around to get a better view with the binoculars.
i look at the 3 satellites with the binoculars and saw a large black object with white lights at the corners of the black triangle.   i should have seen the satellites traveling through the stars but only saw the very large black object   i brought down the binoculars.   looking at the 3 objects, i saw 3 lights and all the stars as though there was no object   i was seeing right though the object.      i look through the binoculars again and saw the large black triangle and  the white lights at each point of the triangle,   they were not blinking.    the black object was so large it filled almost the whole field of view of the binoculars  being so large i was thinking it should be making sound of some type   maybe a jet sound.     bring down the binoculars, i tried to hear something  but not a thing.  the out in the middle of nowhere quiet.   by now the hair on my arms were started to stand up.    i was looking at the 3 satellites moving through  the stars again     i look again through the binoculars again the very large object    by this time i knew what i was looking at. 
 i was thinking i needed to get my wife up to see the object.   bring down the binoculars, i look for the satellites looking light.    the lights were gone.   no moving satellite   they vanish.  i brought up the binoculars and started look for the large object.   no large object.   as large as this object was i should be able to fine it right away,   but it was gone.   disappeared,  vanish,  gone just that fast.
i saw what i saw.   out of the 1000s of all nighter under the stars,   this has been my one and only true unexplainable event over 3 decades of observing.   i am hoping that one night i will see again a life altering event like i did in 1981
content.summary: Tringle shape  see through with out binoculars   large solded looking with binoculars

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to school. and i saw it. iwas scard. i said to mum to go faster. i just had enough time to take a photo.
content.summary: I saw somthing i dont know

content.detailedDescription: On wednesday, june 22, i was on a boat fishing trip with my father. we were on the north fork of the yuba river. on this day at about 5pm i took several pictures of the surrounding canyon and forrest.  we returned home on thursday june 23. while reviewing all the camping photos, i observed an object in the sky above the treeline in one of the pictures. i had taken three pictures within a few seconds of each other. the second picture has the object. the first and third picture of the same location have no object in them. the object looks rectangular, and shiny silver or white on one side. in the location where the photo was taken there were no aircraft in the sky and the only birds we had had seen were hawks or vultures. the area we were in is very secluded. there were no other people around, and no noise other than the river going over a rock bed.
content.summary: Observed object in picture after reviewing camping photos

content.detailedDescription:
my hunting field camera was placed out in the yard for deer pictures . on this particular night an object came in and appeared to examine a deer in front of the camera. the deer acknowledged the object ...There are 16 pics of the incident. the object was less than 13 feet from the camera. the pictures are stunning.These are the most amazing pics !! had an engineer look at them and he feels that no such technology exists . i have tried to contact several news affiliates and was patronized and still no one has seen them . you can probably understand that. the object tilts as if to get a better look at the deer makes some great moves in several directions. the camera takes pis on 3 second intervals so that when you click through them it runs like a video. you really get excited when you see these.

   hope you take the time to talk with me and you will get a better understanding of what i have.
content.summary: Pictures taken by field camera /point blank/it approached a deer/photos are clear and are just crazy /no one has seen them/i believe they are the smoking gun of all ufo photos/please respond
